name: DriverMania
description:
NOTE: If you are on a Mac, please use Safari to play the game.

CONTROLS:

Up Arrow - Forward

Down Arrow - Backward

Right Arrow - Right

Left Arrow - Left

Space Bar - Brakes

R - Respawn

X - Buy Horsepower Modifications (Only possible at red altars)

C - Buy Weight Reduction Modifications (Only possible at red altars)

DriverMania is an open-world arcade driving game where you can drive various types of cars in various environments, from a city, desert to the inside of a castle. You can play DriverMania in three styles of gameplay, the car enthusiast route where you collect money to buy upgrades for your car at various red altars placed throughout the map, the conservative route where your goal is to survive as long as possible by collecting hearts to keep your car fueled up, or the adventurous route where you can randomly teleport to a different part of the map by going through a portal. No matter what style of gameplay you go for, the game will be over when your fuel reaches 0. Like Monopoly, the amount of coins you collect in-game doesn't transfer between gameplay sessions.
